data.title: "A Mozart of poetry": we remember Polish poet Wislawa Szymborska, who passed away #OnThisDay in 2012, aged 88. During her lifetime,...
data.meta_description:
5,483 likes, 45 comments - nobelprize_org on February 1, 2019: ""A Mozart of poetry": we remember Polish poet Wislawa Szymborska, who passed away #OnThisDay in 2012, aged 88. 
During her lifetime, Szymborska wrote around 400 poems. With great subtlety and depth, she uses common everyday images to reflect on larger truths about love, death and passing time.

In 1996, she was awarded the Nobel Prize in Literature "for poetry that with ironic precision allows the historical and biological context to come to light in fragments of human reality."
.
.
.
#nobelprize #nobellaureate #literature #poetry #reading #poet".
